#summary Download and install the Usus plugins

= Dependencies =

You first need !EclEmma, the code coverage tool. Point your Eclipse Update Manager to http://update.eclemma.org/

= Install Usus =

The update site for Usus is http://projectusus.googlecode.com/svn/updates/

= Install Usus Dependency Graph Feature =

To get visualizations for class dependencies and cyclic package dependencies, you need to install ZEST. You can download it from the update site http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/updates/releases/ . Select the two features
  * Graphical Editing Framework Zest Visualization Toolkit
  * Graphical Editing Framework Zest Visualization Toolkit SDK
